entry.content:
Post 192859 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Eesh, the "Black music but it's white people" thing is pretty fraught at best and the weird anti-Asian shit in latter part of that flash animation video is outright awful. I feel you on the fun goofy music instinct but this ain't it. -- cortex
entry.summary: Post 192859 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Eesh, the "Black music but it's white people" thing is pretty fraught at best and the weird anti-Asian shit in latter part of that flash animation video is outright awful. I feel you on the fun goofy music instinct but this ain't it. -- cortex
